website_summaries.verdict: Slightly edgy artwork makes this a line of helmets attractive to older kids who need helmets for skateboarding, BMX and more.
pros: Helmet comes with two sets of pads to adjust to different head sizes
cons: Runs large - may be a better option for tweens and teens
Not as adjustable as other options

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Initially it was just what my son wanted. Unfortunately, it is so cheaply made, the plastic shell MELTED. I have enclosed pictures of the rear bottom of the helmet. The melting occurred while the helmet was simply resting on the handlebar. Which, for some is a regular place to put it. I would love to say it’s great and go ahead and purchase it but... Given the poor quality I would NOT RECOMMEND this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gil B

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is so cool! Bought one for a middle school aged daughter and the 7 yr old wanted one too. So we bought another. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fun-Filled Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, not very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish helmet. My 7yo girl really liked it. There is very little adjustment with the two included neoprene pads, so it's s loose fit even on minimum. It is made for a larger head size, so would not recommend for smaller heads. Protects well & looks good. We use this for ice skating, roller blading & cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Kemyst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, High Quality, Great Artwork Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent helmet. Comes with additional foam to adjust for smaller heads. High quality helmet. The artwork is amazing and my daughter loves the helmet - more wear time is more safety time. This helmet matched the Punisher Blossom Skateboard  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: VERY BIG FOR CHILD'S HEAD
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is cute and matches the skateboard I purchased for my grandaughter, but it's WAY too big for her 9 year old head. It slips all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Beauty & Protection
customer_reviews.text: Really nice skateboard helmet. I love the cherry blossom design, which matched the cherry blossom skateboard I also purchased my daughter. The helmet comes with additional padding to adjust the size if needed. It's very sturdy and provides great protection. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Isa1Isa2Me3

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! This helmet is WAY BIGGER than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The helmet appears to be of good quality, but I'm giving it a two-star review because of the misleading description. The helmet is BIG. The description says that the medium size is good for 5+, but there's no way in H-E-double-hockey-sticks that it would fit a 5-yr-old. My daughter's 6 and she even used the replacement pads that are supposed to turn it into a size small, but it still wobbles around on her head like a mixing bowl. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on my 7 year old! He didn't even needed the extra pads.
customer_reviews.author: SUCKERPUNCH

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but not great fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very durable but the fit is not awesome, slips down toward the back of head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice...lightweight,looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic,lightweight,great design....Was slightly big but my daughter is only 4 so will be waiting until she grows into it....Looks smart compared to some I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Zum

customer_reviews.title: Fit just right.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was better than described. The finish on it was smooth and shiny. With the help of the sizing chart it was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Allina-Turnauer

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: purchased the punisher skateboard cherry Blossom helmet for my daughters' 11th Birthday. She loves skateboarding and I have purchased a few different types of helmets before we purchased this one. not only does she like it because it looks nice, but she likes the fit and the feel. I no longer need to pester her to put her helmet on when she goes out to ride her skateboard or bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Kauaiborn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the style of this helmet. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: virginia ward

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome graphics. My 13 yr old son loves it. Apparently this is the type of helmet kids are wearing at the skate park these days
customer_reviews.author: RN1970

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool great. Teen product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 year old but was a bit big even with the extra padding. More for a bit bigger head or teen. But he loves it looks great and his friends like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Garza

customer_reviews.title: Buy a NUTCASE instead.
customer_reviews.text: Not very well made - a far cry from a nutcase - hard to adjust and the pads don't stay in and the medium is really big for a child - relly like an adult small. Bought it to match the skateboard but its not a really good value.
customer_reviews.author: greenmama

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Quality seemed nice, but too big for my 10 year old even with pads.
customer_reviews.author: CTD

customer_reviews.title: Worth what I paid for it, and cute to boot!
customer_reviews.text: I am a small adult (female) and found this helmet to be larger than expected.It took all the padding (supplied) to make it fit snugly (as a helmet should to function preoperly). It arrived quickly, in good shape. I haven't hit the ground wearing it so I can't comment on how it protects overall. Cute, functional accessory to go with my small-wheeled hobbies. Good size to lug around when not being worn for proper use.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: On the big side. This didn't fit my 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: On the big side. This didn't fit my 10 year old 70 lb. child, even with the extra pads inside. It still swam around on her head.
customer_reviews.author: nanette

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!  TracyinCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this helmet for my goddaughter. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Cool look
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is a hit with my little guy. He had been asking for it for some time, it matches his skateboard. The helmet is a bit big for him but we made it work with the extra inserts we received.
customer_reviews.author: NLA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fit for a small head.
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I thought but it was OK because it fits my wife perfectly so we can safely scooter around town. And not die before I can post about it on my blog www.breathingforher.com
customer_reviews.author: Link

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive helmet, it is well worth it. The fit is great, and it is definitely feminine, which is hard to find in a helmet. I use it for cycling, and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design. Purchased for my boy with the matching board. He gets many compliments from his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking helmet
customer_reviews.text: I got this helmet for my 13 year old son. He loves it and it looks really cool. It has two different types of inner cushioning's that you can change out to help fit your head better too.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking helmet
customer_reviews.text: I got this helmet for my 10 year old son. He loves it and it looks really cool. It has two different types of inner cushioning's that you can change out to help fit your head better too.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet! It is a little big on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! It is a little big on my 13 year old but he is pretty small for his age. Just gives him more use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: mandym

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with the quality of these helmets. Having bought at least 6 in the past ten years, these seem superb in quality than most others. And my twins enjoy the design!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price for cool helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for our 10 yr old granddaughter as she got a bike and a hover board. She loved it and said it was comfortable, which was a relief otherwise it would have been a struggle to get her to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Daughter chose this
customer_reviews.text: Daughter chose this. She loves it, comes with extra pads too, perfect for 10 year old. She gets plenty compliments
customer_reviews.author: l_bon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and matches!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and matches our daughters new skate board! Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Speed Freak

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Colorful Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice helmet. I purchased as a gift for the Angel Tree drive, so I cannot vouch for its performance or fit; however, if I was a young girl I would love this helmet. Goes perfectly with the Punisher Butterfly Jive Skateboard!
customer_reviews.author: Adeline

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old daughter loved this, and it matches her skateboard
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter loved this, and it matches her skateboard. Getting her to wear protective gear is not always easy, but matching helmet and skateboard? She thinks it's cool!
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it and loved that it marched her skateboard. Shes such a fashionista.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Cleaves

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didnt fit my 8 year old. Others with this size description did
customer_reviews.author: William D Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks goood... Will know better if I take a bad fall while rollerblading. Hopefully I'll never know this answer!
customer_reviews.author: Kate D

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking helmet
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking helmet! Got this with the matching skateboard for my 8 year old and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wake

customer_reviews.title: Huge! Way too big for my 8 yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Way too big for my 8 yr old. Used all the extra pads. Tightened the straps. Helmet slips to the side because it is so big.
customer_reviews.author: Ishopped

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter is almost 10. She loves the design.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: ordered the skate board to go with it and grand daughter loved it for christmas. A good beginner skateboard and helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Safety is awesome
customer_reviews.text: She actually wears the helmet since it matches the board, also because it's pretty.
customer_reviews.author: parmi918

customer_reviews.title: It's super cute but horribly uncomfortable and very little padding
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute but horribly uncomfortable and very little padding! It sits high on the head instead of fitting over the head to protect it properly. I'm returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Walton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slightly big for my 11 y.o. girl but is still fitting for her head.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Matches the board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet because it matches the cherry blossom board. Seems like it should come in children's sizes, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: billyt5

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is a girly skateboarder and she loves this helmet. Great protection and very stylish. Highly recommend it for any girl.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri Woolbert

customer_reviews.title: Matches my niece's skateboard
customer_reviews.text: I got it because it has the same graphics as the skateboard I had gotten for my neice, and now she wanted the helmet to match. She needed a helmet anyway, so it was a good choice. It's a nice helmet and hopefully she'll wear it often, as it can be used for different activities beyond skateboarding. It is a nice looking helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Addison

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old likes this
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift for my 9 year old. It feels perfect and she likes it. Had to use the pads to make it fit
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: very cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Bright colors. My 9 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet great padding, love that it came with extra pads to allow it to fit smaller heads. Bought this for my daughter and I know she will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely large and rounded.
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely large and rounded. I bought it for my 7 yr old daughter and it is even bigger than my own bike helmet
customer_reviews.author: richal

customer_reviews.title: DON't Purchase Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: DON't PURCHASE THIS ITEM! The helmet fell apart! Purchased in June and fell apart in September. I would select any star, but it was required to post the review.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Polycarpe

customer_reviews.title: Gift giving idea
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my grandsons and they were a perfect fit. Boys loved the design and were a big hit.....just hope they will keep them on their heads and not in their closet!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but BIG
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daugher I thought this was a small even with the additional pads it is to big for her to wear safely. She is ten and pretty average in size. I think if you are buying for a child look elsewhere size is an issue even though it does look really cool etc. having a lose fitting helmet is no go.
customer_reviews.author: A E Chippindall

customer_reviews.title: butterfly's can't touch this
customer_reviews.text: I got this to protect my head while I skateboard; it does so very well and , as a plus, protected me from the gang of skaters that tried to kick my head in for being 45 and skateboarding on their turf; Thank you bloody butterfly helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my grandsons and they were a perfect fit. Boys loved the design and were a big hit.....just hope they will keep them on their heads and not in their closet!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and my 8 year old loves it! Adjustable straps are a must and the vents save her from a sweaty head!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Montana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this helmet. Easy to adjust, she has no complaints about the fit.
customer_reviews.author: ERH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, and my son absolutely loves it. Anything to keep them wearing helmets!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lonteen

customer_reviews.title: Fits good with a little wiggle room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She is 8 yrs old. Fits good with a little wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: ag********5

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match the Punisher skateboard for my kid. Helmet even fits my head without pads and I have an average size melon for an adult. With pads it's too tight for me and my daughter (she is 12.)
customer_reviews.author: FrickandMab

customer_reviews.title: Fits adults
customer_reviews.text: Fit a female, adult head well with the extra pads. Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: pretty colors and designs
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my daughter for Christmas, pretty colors and designs. Fits a female head up to 23"
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice helmet with an awesome design. I'm an adult and this helmet fits me just right.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gerits

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh.......
customer_reviews.text: This was way smaller than I had expected it too be.... If you have a small head like a 8 year old it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was way too big for a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design
customer_reviews.text: Great design, but the fit was a loose and difficult to adjust with additional padding that was provided. I had to purchase a new helmet that could be tried on,
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: She lovedit.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. My daughter loved the design. You don't find these creative designs in the store usually.
customer_reviews.author: BrownFamily

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for my youngest son because he got a skateboard for Christmas. It appears to fit fine. I don't know how well it works because he hasn't skateboarded yet. But I am sure this will come in handy for his falls. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Janina Jones

product_meta.title: Punisher Skateboards 11-Vent Multi-Sport Skateboard and BMX Helmet, Youth Size Medium, Includes Extra Helmet Pads, Boys and Girls, Assorted Styles
feature_bullets: Punisher Skateboards TNT Safety Helmet To Match The TNT Skateboard. Size Medium Helmet Shell.

Two sets of interior pads (small and medium) The smaller interior pads make the interior an effective size medium 56-58cm. Also includes a thick set of interior pads that will make the helmet a size smaller; youth size small 54-56cm
ABS protetive shell with black EPS foam interior liner, certified to current CPSC standards.
Adjustable chin straps with 11-vents so that you can stay cool. Great helmet for skate board, skates, inline skates, scooters, BMX and more.
100% Satisfaction . Designed in the USA. American owned and operated business with over 30 years in the Skate and Cycling Industry.
